title: Are you an Animal Lover? | Jungle + Farm Animal Song Compilation | Pinkfong Kids Songs

tasks.task: Exploring the Jungle and Farm Animals
subtasks: Jumping into the jungle
Climbing a tree
Hide in a bush
Riding on a raft
Staying in a cave
Riding a bus around the farm
Singing animal sounds and movements
Telling stories of crocodiles, snakes, and other jungle creatures
Discovering a Venus flytrap in the jungle
Finding friendly jungle animals and guides
Cleaning and taking care of fingers (Finger Family)
Addressing a sleeping bag spill and catching the culprit
Knocking on barn doors to guess animals inside
Interacting with different farm animals (pig, chicken, etc.)
Participating in a dance party and number counting on the farm
Rescuing the little boat stuck in the jungle
Overcoming challenges to let the boat sail
Helping the tiny scared boat overcome its fear
Propelling the boat with efforts and determination

tasks.task: Cleaning and Taking Care of Doll Pin Pon
subtasks: Washing Pin Pon's face with soap
Brushing Pin Pon's hair with a hairbrush
Caring for Pin Pon before bedtime
Listening and identifying animal sounds
Distinguishing correct sounds (e.g., crocodile's roar, pig's oink)
Correctly identifying various animal voices on the farm
Saving the tiger from the snake and finding hidden animal sounds
